<% _.each(list,function(deal){ %>
订单编号：<%= deal.id %>
店名：<%= deal.shopName %>
购买时间：<%= moment(deal.startTime,"x").format("YYYY_MM_DD") %>
物流：<%= deal.logistics||"未发货" %>
物流单号：<%= deal.logNumber||"未发货" %>
<% _.each(deal.product,function(point){ %>
商品名：<%= point.name %>
商品属性：<%= point.modelString %>
单价：<%= point.price %>
数量：<%= point.count %>
<% }) %>
<% if(deal.state==0){print("没支付")} else if(deal.state==1){print("已支付")} else if(deal.state==2){print("已发货")} else if(deal.state==3){print("已收货")} else if(deal.state==4){print("已评价")} else if(deal.state==5){print("已取消")} else if(deal.state==6){print("退货")} %>
<% if(deal.state==0&&type==0){ %>
取消订单
去支付
<% } %> <% if(deal.state==1&&type==0){ %>
申请退货
<% } %> <% if(deal.state==1&&type==1){ %>
发货
<% } %> <% if(deal.state==2&&type==0){ %>
确认收货
申请退货
<% } %> <% if(deal.state==3&&type==0){ %>
去评价
<% } %> <% if(deal.state==6&&type==1){ %>
确认退款
<% } %>
<% }) %>
